content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of property in a divorce case the defendant was ordered to pay stamp duty and professional fees the movable property a car and the immovable property an apartment were both awarded to the defendant however the defendant was ordered to compensate the applicant for their share of the property the applicant requested the court to grant them the defendants property the text also discusses various aspects of matrimonial property including the statutory regime joint property deviation from equal shares and shareable property the applicant filed a lawsuit to dissolve their marriage and requested the division of marital property which includes an apartment and a car the court will consider the value and interests of the parties in deciding on the division of joint property the defendants separate properties will remain theirs the court will also decide on the division of outstanding obligations and the applicants entitlement to maintenance the costs of the proceedings including stamp duty and legal fees will be borne by the applicant the court has allowed the dissolution of the marriage and awarded the defendant an apartment and a car the defendant is also responsible for paying the applicants legal costs

metadata.marital_regime: statutory regime, joint property, deviation from equal shares, shareable property
